data.title: OLTL Background on Mitch, please?
data.text:
I wasn't watching when Mitch was on, so could someone please give answers to

these questions?

1. Who was he? Who did he know? Is he related to someone, or a drifter, or

a friend of someone?

2. What plot(s) was he involved in?

3. When was he on? What is his timeline?

4. How and when did he die?

5. What is his relevance to Viki/Jess/Natalie/Allison?

If there are other questions I have missed (like if other people chime in

and add to this list), please give answers to these too! I just want to

know a little about this guy. Thanks.

--

--S.

OLTL's Mitch Lawrence - Roscoe Born

Some people die for their art, but Mitch Lawrence died because of art.

Dorian klled the cult leader/drug leader/lunatic with a piece of

sculpture -- because he tried to rape her daughter, Cassie.

When Llanview was looking for a cult leader, Mitch Lawrence was happy to

provide the service. He lured many townspeople into his cult, including a

vulnerable Tina, and hypnotized a majority of them into killing people.

Thankfully, Tina never became a murderer. Actually Mitch was running his

cult as a cover for a drug ring, but that didn't make him any less crazy. He

was a maniac who tried to rape Cassie, then a neophyte reporter who was

investigating him on one of her first big stories. When he got in trouble,

Kevin wasn't around to rescue her (he was in grade school instead). Her

mother, Dorian had to come to her rescue. Dorian hit Mitch over the head

with a sculpture and killed him. Dorian was convicted of murdering this nut

and was sent to Statesville Prison. She was let out a few months later when

evidence revealed that she had murdered Mitch in self -defense.

> I wasn't watching when Mitch was on, so could someone please give answers to

> a friend of someone?

> 4. How and when did he die?

> 5. What is his relevance to Viki/Jess/Natalie/Allison?

Okay, I'm going to try and answer all these in the following.

When Mitch first arrived in Llanview, he was with Tina. He knew of a

little known detail in Victor Lord's will that read: "If Viki becomes

Niki, she loses the fortune" which made Tina inherit it all. He also knew

that Tina was really Victor Lord's only other surviving child (no one knew

of Todd then). At a Banner dinner, they rigged things hoping Niki would

come out, then Mitch proceeded to gaslight Viki. He set it up eventually

to make it look like Viki killed Harry O'Neill (I may be a little off here

but its the gist of the material), and instead the crime was pinned on

Tina. At the trial, Viki became Niki and cleared Tina, caught Mitch, and

we were stuck with Niki for awhile.

Mitch was shipped off to prison (part of the reason why I won't buy him as

the twins' father, the other being Viki did not have a part in the cult

story). While in jail, he found "religion" and set up a phony jail break

which he came across as all good and pure. In reality, he was the

mastermind and had others take the fall. He was let out by pardon for his

part in controling the prison revolt and he added to Llanview where he set

up a ministry (ie. cult). He ensnared pretty young women and gullible

young men. He drugged them (or that was the excuse) and picked one of the

faithful to sleep with him at night. Marilynn Dennison refused which

brought Tom (her father) to town. He was a dead ringer for Viki's dead

husband Joe.

Anyway -- Cassie went undercover to get the goods on the cult, got

drugged, picked by Mitch to be his disciple and worship in his room/bed

one night. Dorian arrived, conked him over the head, got Cassie out, went

to jail. Mitch is dead and buried -- we've even seen his headstone and

had Tina remark on not much loss.

The next time we see Mitch is during Viki's heaven visitation. She is on

the ship and must face issues, one of which is Niki. Mitch is there as an

antagonist (sic). When she defeats him, he is sentenced to a life of

silence.
